Dating: NAQADA II (not before); NAQADA; NAQADA III (not after)
Name: Cosmetic palette
Description: This palette conventionally represents a tilapis fish. The degenerated fins and the spines of the tail are indicated by incised lines; the tail is small. The eyes are indicated by a hole drilled through the palette. A small hole for suspending is pierced in the upper part of the palette. According to parallels, it can be dated to late Naqada II - early Naqada III period.
